document_data.name: Mermaid's breath
document_data.creator: [[Hedge wizard]]s
document_data.mainbody: '''Mermaid's breath''' was an [[alchemical]] draught used to revive the drowned.
document_data.Powers: When applied into the mouth of a recently drowned person (no later than four minutes), it gave them a chance at reviving.
document_data.History: The synthesis of this concoction was extremely delicate, requiring both chemical and herbal knowledge in order to brew correctly.{{Cite dragon/163/Hedge Wizards|24}} [[Hedge wizard]]s often traded in it, stocking up if they were near bodies of water. It sold for about 1000 [[gold pieces]].
